actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to provide a People's Counsel in the Public Service Commission.

summary.text: Requires the Mayor of the District of Columbia, by and with the advice and consent of the Council, to appoint a People's Counsel in the Public Service Commission to represent the people of the District of Columbia in all proceedings related to the rates or services furnished by public utilities under the jurisdiction of the Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to provide a People's Counsel in the Public Service Commission.
